title: No module named future
body_html:
I try to use the torch_nightly version (https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu92/torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180925-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). When i try the cpp__extension, the error occurs.

The code:

from torch.utils.cpp_extension import BuildExtension, CUDAExtension

error is

ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'future'
body_text:
I try to use the torch_nightly version (https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu92/torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180925-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). When i try the cpp__extension, the error occurs.
The code:
from torch.utils.cpp_extension import BuildExtension, CUDAExtension

error is
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'future'
body:
I try to use the torch_nightly version (https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cu92/torch_nightly-1.0.0.dev20180925-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl). When i try the cpp__extension, the error occurs.

The code:
```
from torch.utils.cpp_extension import BuildExtension, CUDAExtension
```
error is
```
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'future'

```
